What this means
- An invitation exists (the repository metadata shows a pending invite for your email) but I could not locate an acceptance email in the accessible GitHub-linked unread mail and I could not read your general mailbox due to access restrictions. Because there is no tool available here to “click” the invite on your behalf in GitHub, you’ll need to accept it from your side.

How to accept the invitation (two ways)
1) Via email
- Check the email account emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com (including Spam / Junk). Look for a message from GitHub about an invitation to collaborate on "alicemiller/sorting_searching" and click the “View invitation” or “Accept invitation” link in that message.

2) Directly on GitHub (no email needed)
- Sign in to GitHub with your account.
- Open the Repository Invitations page where you can accept pending invites:
  - Visit: https://github.com/settings/repository-invitations
  - On that page you should see the pending invitation for alicemiller/sorting_searching and a button to Accept.

If you don’t see the invite
- Check spam/junk or other email filters.
- If it still isn’t visible on https://github.com/settings/repository-invitations, ask Alice to re-send the invitation from the repository’s “Settings → Manage access → Invite a collaborator” flow.
